title: Labor Law Fundamentals Course Utilizing Visual Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Legal Concepts and Understanding of Labor Law Terminology
context.additional_context: A simulation-based learning environment focused on the labor law framework for civil servants

learning_goals: Learners can visually classify and compare complex labor law principles using Venn diagrams
Learners improve transfer skills by connecting legal concepts to real-world cases through simulation examples
Learners can record and analyze their academic performance as metadata using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
